title: 255: Music Broads
itunes:title: 255: Music Broads
description:
Let’s get musical! Broads, the time has finally come for Bekah and Jess to talk - MUSIC! Join The Broads during today’s episode where they have an unexpected episode talking entirely about their favorite music, songs that make them cry, bands that where instrumental in their lives, their concert experiences, festival boyfriends, wedding songs, their most romantic memories from music, and a whole lot more! #bandbroads #balladbroads #bassbroads #broadswithabeat 

CHECK OUT THE PLAYLIST OF ALL THE SONGS DISCUSSED IN THE EPISODE: https://open.spotify.com/playlist/4kJOCet5K1wpPdVC1MQJzw?si=sL-JmEIOQviz4Z-NuWTotQ&dl_branch=1

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:***PRETTY LITTER: visit PRETTYLITTER.COM and use promo code CHATTY for 20% off your first order! ***ROTHY’S: Check out all the amazing shoes, bags, and masks available right now at ROTHY’S.COM/CHATTY***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM/CHATTY12 and use code CHATTY12 for 12 free meals, including free shipping!***TRUFF: Get 15% off site-wide plus FREE shipping with promo code CHATTY at TRUFF.COM

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
